description.zh-cn: 香港甘草演员，前无线电视及亚洲电视艺员，亦是已故粤剧武生靓元亨的孙子。常在影视剧中饰演西装人士、警官等角色，其在《醉打金枝》及《金装四大才子》中饰演的“卜一卜”一角深入人心。
description.en: A veteran Hong Kong actor, formerly with TVB and ATV, and the grandson of the late Cantonese opera martial artist Leng Yuanheng. He often plays roles such as professionals in suits and police officers in film and television. His role as 'Bok Yat Bok' in 'Taming of the Princess' and 'The Legendary Four Aces' is particularly well-known.

description.zh-cn: 已故著名粤剧武生，李子奇的祖父。
description.en: A late renowned Cantonese opera martial artist (wusheng), and the grandfather of Lee Chi Kay.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的一所男子中学。
description.en: A secondary school for boys located in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的一所中学。
description.en: A secondary school located in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 加拿大的一所公立大学。
description.en: A public university in Canada.

description.zh-cn: 香港特别行政区政府的独立执法机构，专责打击贪污。
description.en: An independent law enforcement agency of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region Government responsible for combating corruption.

description.zh-cn: 香港一家已停播的免费电视台。
description.en: A defunct free-to-air television station in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 香港首家获得免费无线电视牌照的电视台。
description.en: The first free-to-air television station in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 前无线电视艺员科经理。
description.en: Former manager of the artist department at Television Broadcasts Limited (TVB).

description.zh-cn: 已故香港演员，被李子奇视为演艺事业的启蒙老师。
description.en: A late Hong Kong actor, regarded by Lee Chi Kay as his mentor in his acting career.

description.zh-cn: 香港女演员。
description.en: Hong Kong actress.

description.zh-cn: 香港女演员。
description.en: Hong Kong actress.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员，李子奇的圈中友人。
description.en: Hong Kong actor and a friend of Lee Chi Kay in the entertainment industry.

description.zh-cn: 香港演员，李子奇的圈中友人。
description.en: Hong Kong actor and a friend of Lee Chi Kay in the entertainment industry.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的特别行政区。
description.en: A special administrative region of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 李子奇是靓元亨的孙子。
description.en: Lee Chi Kay is the grandson of Leng Yuanheng.

description.zh-cn: 时任无线电视艺员科经理的陈灌明协助李子奇于1990年加入无线电视。
description.en: Chan Kwun-ming, then manager of TVB's artist department, assisted Lee Chi Kay in joining TVB in 1990.

description.zh-cn: 李子奇视王伟为自己的启蒙老师，并向其请教演戏方法，学习为角色写自传以投入角色。
description.en: Lee Chi Kay regarded Wong Wai as his mentor, from whom he sought advice on acting techniques, such as writing a biography for a character to better embody the role.

description.zh-cn: 2002年拍摄剧集《绝世好爸》时，刘锦玲指控李子奇在拍摄一场拉扯戏时触摸其胸部，此事直至2007年她才为他平反。
description.en: In 2002, during the filming of the drama 'Family Man', Lau Kam Ling accused Lee Chi Kay of touching her chest during a scuffle scene. She later cleared him of the accusation in 2007.

description.zh-cn: 2002年，李子奇与井莉传出绯闻，但该传闻被女方否认。
description.en: In 2002, there were rumors of a romantic relationship between Lee Chi Kay and Ching Li, which were denied by her.

description.zh-cn: 与李子奇是圈中友人，公余时会一起钓鱼。
description.en: A friend of Lee Chi Kay in the entertainment industry; they go fishing together in their spare time.

description.zh-cn: 与李子奇是圈中友人，公余时会一起钓鱼。
description.en: A friend of Lee Chi Kay in the entertainment industry; they go fishing together in their spare time.
